title: Savoury panettone
ingredients: ['For the panettone bread', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '1 1/2 teaspoon salt', '160ml lukewarm milk, plus more as needed', '17g fresh yeast', '1 teaspoon sugar', '250g 00 grade flour for bread', '250g strong bread flour', '60ml lukewarm water', '80g butter, room temperature', 'For the tuna stuffing', '3 tablespoons mayonnaise', '90g tuna, drained', '100g cooked prawns', '4 lettuce leaves', 'For the tapenade', '4 tablespoons olives', '2 anchovies', '1 tablespoon capers', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '4 slices mozzarella cheese', 'For the cheese stuffing', '3 tablespoons cream cheese', '50g ham, cubed', '3 or 4 slices prosciutto or roast turkey']
